reviews.review: FPS游戏常青树，还要啥理由
Всё классно, кроме прозрачного смока и VAC. До сих пор не понимаю смысл играть с читами на прайме, когда он стоит 1к
Good game, if you play FACEIT

This game is so many shoot bullets i cannot see all of them at once, if you can shoot your bullet before the other guy shooting a bullet, then it is obvious you can win. Many different gun in this game, to many i cant keep track, so i only use 1 at a time, this is best i think. If you like game with many bullet and friendly team they wil help u win, then this game is good for you, but try to see the bullets or they will overwhelming force you in the head. ggwp.
Я не знаю почему я всё ещё играю в это.
no bcs this game bans you permnatley if u headshot your enemies continously
after all these yrs, still having  pack of cheaters

Рецепт блинчиков
молоко 500 мл
яйца 3 шт.
мука 200 г
масло сливочное (или растительное) 30 г (2 ст. ложки)
сахар 30 г (2 ст. ложки)
соль 2-3 г (1/2 ч. ложки)
Melhor jogo, o brabo das galáxia.
quase me suicidei por conta desse lixo de jogo, porém viciante!

Fun in the beginning until you start looking for reputation and starts want to get good and rank up but soon you will get addicted and depressed and become a monster for yourself and everyone around you. You will stop showering, eating, sleeping and loving. You will never see sunlight again and become the depressed quiet kid in school. It's pretty fun sometimes tho.
really good game that everyone should experience
